name: Pefkos Village Resort

reviews.text: We stayed in the Pefkos Village Apartments in Pefkos for 2 weeks, the apartments are lovely, they are well above the usual standard expected in greece, the only downside is the distance to the town and beach which is about a 20 min walk, which is usual circumstances is fine, but in 40 degree plus heat it is too far, we had to hire a car for the time we were there, which incidentally only cost 160 euro for the 9 days we had it, we visited rhodes town several times also lindos and drove all over the island to various beaches, we like Glystra which is just past Lardos, and also Tsambika which is towards Rhodes Town, would definately go back to Rhodes, but maybe not to the Pefkos Village Apartments in July Aug Time because of the distance to the beach in the heat.
reviews.title: loved rhodes

likes.disliked: — too far to town and beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Really enjoyed our holiday at Pefkos Village Resort in the middle of June. Rooms are very clean and well equipped. Staff are excellent. Towels changed every couple of days and linen twice a week. Food in the restaurant is very good. Its a 20 minute walk from the centre of Pefkos but we really enjoyed the stroll and the distance from town means its lovely and quiet at night. There are loads of restaurants, and some supermarkets, on the way into town anyway so you don't actually have to walk all the way to the centre every night. Favourite restaurants for us were Nikolas (just up the road towards town), Tsambikos (Bakery of Pefkos) and Lindos Cuisine (in the town centre). Having said that we didn't have a bad meal all fortnight and you could eat in a different restaurant for a month we reckoned, there are so many.
reviews.title: Lovely Apartments

likes.liked: — The rooms are spacious and very clean
likes.disliked: — Cost of air conditioning but its probably fairly steep across the whole of the island

description: Situated on the outskirts of the resort and just 20 meters from a fantastic sandy bay, the Pefkos village Resort is the ideal place for a relaxing and unique holiday. The hotel is recently renovated and built in a traditional Greek style. The rooms are comfortable and nicely decorated. The complex is within a walking distance from the center of the resort and only 5 km from Lindos. most importantly the staff here will be more than happy to make sure you have a great holiday.
